results.content:
Really great so far! I dont understand a previous review that said english wasnt good? its basically perfect? and im English? :D

he sounds american if anything but near perfect english, so ignore that review!

Also the content so far is great, i dont usually review early but he clearly explains concepts in a nice and efficient manner. Very good

results.content:
The instructor could actually wrap up a 6 minutes lecture into 3-4 minutes if he plans in advance what he's going to speak.

1. English is very poor and hence it feels annoying.
2. If you stay to the point and focus on being more clear in what you speak, it'll be more fun.
3. The content is very good. I am rating it 2.5 for the bad language only.
